member.name: T:RestEase.AllowAnyStatusCodeAttribute
member.summary: Controls whether the given method, or all methods within the given interface, will throw an exception if the response status code does not indicate success

member.name: P:RestEase.AllowAnyStatusCodeAttribute.AllowAnyStatusCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to suppress the exception normally thrown on responses that do not indicate success

member.name: M:RestEase.AllowAnyStatusCodeAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class, which does allow any status code

member.name: M:RestEase.AllowAnyStatusCodeAttribute.#ctor(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the classe whi
member.param: True to allow any response status code; False to throw an exception on response status codes that do not indicate success

member.name: T:RestEase.ApiException
member.summary: Exception thrown when a bad API response is received

member.name: P:RestEase.ApiException.StatusCode
member.summary: Gets the HTTP status code received

member.name: P:RestEase.ApiException.ReasonPhrase
member.summary: Gets the ReasonPhrase associated with the response

member.name: P:RestEase.ApiException.Headers
member.summary: Gets the headers associated with the response

member.name: P:RestEase.ApiException.ContentHeaders
member.summary: Gets the content headers associated with the response

member.name: P:RestEase.ApiException.Content
member.summary: Gets the content associated with the response, if any

member.name: P:RestEase.ApiException.HasContent
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether any content is associated with the response

member.name: T:RestEase.BodyAttribute
member.summary: Attribute specifying that this parameter should be interpreted as the request body

member.name: P:RestEase.BodyAttribute.SerializationMethod
member.summary: Gets the serialization method to use. Defaults to BodySerializationMethod.Serialized

member.name: M:RestEase.BodyAttribute.#ctor
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class

member.name: M:RestEase.BodyAttribute.#ctor(RestEase.BodySerializationMethod)
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class, using the given body serialization method
member.param: Serialization method to use when serializing the body object

member.name: T:RestEase.BodySerializationMethod
member.summary: Type of serialization that should be applied to the body

member.name: F:RestEase.BodySerializationMethod.Serialized
member.summary: Serialized using the configured IRequestBodySerializer (uses Json.NET by default)

member.name: F:RestEase.BodySerializationMethod.UrlEncoded
member.summary: Serialized using Form URL Encoding. The body must implement IDictionary

member.name: F:RestEase.BodySerializationMethod.Default
member.summary: Use the default serialization method. You probably don't want to specify this yourself

member.name: P:RestEase.HeaderAttribute.Value

member.summary: Serialize the given request body

member.returns: HttpContent to assign to the request

member.name: T:RestEase.IRequester
member.summary: Called by the generated REST API implementation, this knows how to invoke the API and return a suitable response

member.name: M:RestEase.IRequester.RequestVoidAsync(RestEase.Implementation.IRequestInfo)
member.summary: Invoked when the API interface method being called returns a Task
member.param: Object holding all information about the request
member.returns: Task to return to the API interface caller

member.name: M:RestEase.IRequester.RequestAsync``1(RestEase.Implementation.IRequestInfo)
member.summary: Invoked when the API interface method being called returns a Task{T}
member.typeparam: Type of response object expected by the caller
member.param: Object holding all information about the request
member.returns: Task to return to the API interface caller

member.name: M:RestEase.IRequester.RequestWithResponseMessageAsync(RestEase.Implementation.IRequestInfo)
member.summary: Invoked when the API interface method being called returns a Task{HttpResponseMessage}
member.param: Object holding all information about the request
member.returns: Task to return to the API interface caller

member.name: M:RestEase.IRequester.RequestWithResponseAsync``1(RestEase.Implementation.IRequestInfo)
member.summary: Invoked when the API interface method being called returns a Task{Response{T}}
member.typeparam: Type of response object expected by the caller
member.param: Object holding all information about the request
member.returns: Task to return to the API interface caller

member.name: M:RestEase.IRequester.RequestRawAsync(RestEase.Implementation.IRequestInfo)
member.summary: Invoked when the API interface method being called returns a Task{string}
member.param: Object holding all information about the request
member.returns: Task to return to the API interface caller

member.name: T:RestEase.IRequestQueryParamSerializer
member.summary: Helper which knows how to serialize query parmaeters

member.name: M:RestEase.IRequestQueryParamSerializer.SerializeQueryParam``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Serialize a query parameter whose value is scalar (not a collection), into a collection of name -> value pairs
member.remarks: Most of the time, you will only return a single KeyValuePair from this method. However, you are given the flexibility, to return multiple KeyValuePairs if you wish. Duplicate keys are allowed: they will be serialized as separate query parameters.
member.typeparam: Type of the value to serialize
member.returns: A colletion of name -> value pairs to use as query parameters

member.name: M:RestEase.IRequestQueryParamSerializer.SerializeQueryCollectionParam``1(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Serialize a query parameter whose value is a collection, into a collection of name -> value pairs
member.remarks: Most of the time, you will return a single KeyValuePair for each value in the collection, and all will have the same key. However this is not required: you can return whatever you want.
member.typeparam: Type of the value to serialize
member.returns: A colletion of name -> value pairs to use as query parameters

member.name: T:RestEase.IResponseDeserializer
member.summary: Helper capable of deserializing a response, to return to the caller

member.name: M:RestEase.IResponseDeserializer.Deserialize``1(System.String,System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage)
member.summary: Read the response string from the response, deserialize, and return a deserialized object
member.typeparam: Type of object to deserialize into
member.param: String content read from the response
HttpResponseMessage. Consider calling response.Content.ReadAsStringAsync() to retrieve a string
member.returns: Deserialized response

member.name: M:RestEase.JsonRequestQueryParamSerializer.SerializeQueryParam``1(System.String,``0)
member.summary: Serialize a query parameter whose value is scalar (not a collection), into a collection of name -> value pairs
member.remarks: Most of the time, you will only return a single KeyValuePair from this method. However, you are given the flexibility, to return multiple KeyValuePairs if you wish. Duplicate keys are allowed: they will be serialized as separate query parameters.
member.typeparam: Type of the value to serialize
member.returns: A colletion of name -> value pairs to use as query parameters

member.name: M:RestEase.JsonRequestQueryParamSerializer.SerializeQueryCollectionParam``1(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})
member.summary: Serialize a query parameter whose value is a collection, into a collection of name -> value pairs
member.remarks: Most of the time, you will return a single KeyValuePair for each value in the collection, and all will have the same key. However this is not required: you can return whatever you want.

member.returns: A colletion of name -> value pairs to use as query parameters

member.name: T:RestEase.RestClient
member.summary: Creates REST API clients from a suitable interface. Your single point of interaction with RestEase

member.name: F:RestEase.RestClient.FactoryAssemblyName
member.summary: Name of the assembly in which interface implementations are built. Use in [assembly: InternalsVisibleTo(RestEase.FactoryAssemblyName)] to allow clients to be generated for internal interface types

member.name: P:RestEase.RestClient.ResponseDeserializer
member.summary: Gets or sets the deserializer used to deserialize responses

member.name: P:RestEase.RestClient.JsonSerializerSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets the JsonSerializerSettings to use with all non-overridden serializers / deserializers

member.name: P:RestEase.RestClient.RequestBodySerializer
member.summary: Gets or sets the serializer used to serialize request bodies (when [Body(BodySerializationMethod.Serialized)] is used)

member.name: P:RestEase.RestClient.RequestQueryParamSerializer
member.summary: Gets or sets the serializer used to serialize query parameters (when [Query(QuerySerializationMethod.Serialized)] is used)

member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class, with the given Base URL

member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class, using the given HttpClient

member.name: M:RestEase.RestClient.For``1
member.summary: Create an implementation for the given API interface
member.typeparam: Type of interfae to implement
member.returns: An implementation which can be used to make REST requests

member.name: M:RestEase.RestClient.For``1(RestEase.IRequester)
member.summary: Create a client using the given IRequester. This gives you the greatest ability to customise functionality
member.typeparam: Interface representing the API
member.returns: An implementation of that interface which you can use to invoke the API

member.name: M:RestEase.RestClient.For``1(System.String)
member.summary: Shortcut to create a client using the given url
member.typeparam: Interface representing the API
member.returns: An implementation of that interface which you can use to invoke the API

member.name: M:RestEase.RestClient.For``1(System.Net.Http.HttpClient)
member.summary: Shortcut to create a client using the given HttpClient
member.typeparam: Interface representing the API
member.param: HttpClient to use to make requests
member.returns: An implementation of that interface which you can use to invoke the API

member.name: M:RestEase.RestClient.For``1(System.String,RestEase.RequestModifier)
member.summary: Shortcut to create a client using the given URL and request interceptor
member.typeparam: Interface representing the API
member.returns: An implementation of that interface which you can use to invoke the API

member.summary: Create a client using the given base URL and Json.NET serializer settings

member.param: Serializer settings to pass to Json.NET
member.returns: An implementation of that interface which you can use to invoke the API

member.summary: Create a client using the given base URL and Json.NET serializer settings

member.param: Serializer settings to pass to Json.NET
member.returns: An implementation of that interface which you can use to invoke the API

Serializer to use when serializing request bodies, when appropriate

Serializer to use when serializing request bodiess, when appropriate

member.name: T:RestEase.Implementation.Requester
member.summary: Clas used by generated implementations to make HTTP requests

member.name: P:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.ResponseDeserializer
member.summary: Gets or sets the deserializer used to deserialize responses

member.name: P:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.RequestBodySerializer
member.summary: Gets or sets the serializer used to serialize request bodies (when [Body(BodySerializationMethod.Serialized)] is used)

member.name: P:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.RequestQueryParamSerializer
member.summary: Gets or sets the serializer used to serialize query parameters (when [Query(QuerySerializationMethod.Serialized)] is used)

member.name: M:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient)
member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class, using the given HttpClient
member.param: HttpClient to use to make requests

member.name: M:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.SubstitutePathParameters(RestEase.Implementation.IRequestInfo)
member.summary: Takes the Path, PathParams, and PathProperties from the given IRequestInfo, and constructs a path with placeholders substituted for their desired values.
member.remarks: Note that this method assumes that valdation has occurred. That is, there won't by any placeholders with no value, or values without a placeholder.
member.param: IRequestInfo to get Path, PathParams, and PathProperties from
member.returns: The constructed path, with placeholders substituted for their actual values

member.name: M:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.ConstructUri(System.String,RestEase.Implementation.IRequestInfo)
member.summary: Given an IRequestInfo and pre-substituted relative path, constructs a URI with the right query parameters
member.param: Path to start with, with placeholders already substituted
IRequestInfo to retrieve the query parameters from
member.returns: Constructed URI; relative if 'path' was relative, otherwise absolute

member.name: M:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.SerializeBodyForUrlEncoding(System.Object)
member.summary: Given an object, attempt to serialize it into a form suitable for URL Encoding
member.remarks: Currently only supports objects which implement IDictionary
member.returns: Key/value collection suitable for URL encoding

member.name: M:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.TransformDictionaryToCollectionOfKeysAndValues(System.Object)
member.summary: Takes an IDictionary or IDictionary{TKey, TValue}, and emits KeyValuePairs for each key Takes account of IEnumerable values, null values, etc
member.returns: A set of KeyValuePairs

member.name: M:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.SerializeQueryParameter(RestEase.Implementation.QueryParameterInfo)
member.summary: Serializes the value of a query parameter, using an appropriate method
member.returns: Serialized value

member.name: M:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.ConstructContent(RestEase.Implementation.IRequestInfo)
member.summary: Given an IRequestInfo which may have a BodyParameterInfo, construct a suitable HttpContent for it if possible
member.param: IRequestInfo to get the BodyParameterInfo for
member.returns: null if no body is set, otherwise a suitable HttpContent (StringContent, StreamContent, FormUrlEncodedContent, etc)

member.name: M:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.ApplyHeaders(RestEase.Implementation.IRequestInfo,System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage)
member.summary: Given an IRequestInfo containing a number of class/method/param headers, and a HttpRequestMessage, add the headers to the message, taing priority and overriding into account
member.param: IRequestInfo to get the headers from
HttpRequestMessage to add the headers to

member.name: M:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.ApplyHeadersSet(System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.String,System.String}})
member.summary: Given a set of headers, apply them to the given HttpRequestMessage. Headers will override any of that type already present
member.param: HttpRequestMessage to add the headers to

member.name: M:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.SendRequestAsync(RestEase.Implementation.IRequestInfo)
member.summary: Given an IRequestInfo, construct a HttpRequestMessage, send it, check the response for success, then return it
member.param: IRequestInfo to construct the request from
member.returns: Resulting HttpResponseMessage

member.name: M:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.Deserialize``1(System.String,System.Net.Http.HttpResponseMessage)
member.summary: Calls this.ResponseDeserializer.ReadAndDeserializeAsync, after checking it's not null
member.typeparam: Type of object to deserialize into
member.param: String content read from the response
member.returns: A task containing the deserialized response

member.name: M:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.RequestVoidAsync(RestEase.Implementation.IRequestInfo)
member.summary: Called from interface methods which return a Task
member.param: IRequestInfo to construct the request from
member.returns: Task which completes when the request completed

member.name: M:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.RequestAsync``1(RestEase.Implementation.IRequestInfo)
member.summary: Called from interface methods which return a Task{CustomType}. Deserializes and returns the response
member.typeparam: Type of the response, to deserialize into
member.param: IRequestInfo to construct the request from
member.returns: Task resulting in the deserialized response

member.name: M:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.RequestWithResponseMessageAsync(RestEase.Implementation.IRequestInfo)
member.summary: Called from interface methods which return a Task{HttpResponseMessage}
member.param: IRequestInfo to construct the request from
member.returns: Task containing the result of the request

member.name: M:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.RequestWithResponseAsync``1(RestEase.Implementation.IRequestInfo)
member.summary: Called from interface methods which return a Task{Response{T}}
member.typeparam: Type of the response, to deserialize into
member.param: IRequestInfo to construct the request from
member.returns: Task containing a Response{T}, which contains the raw HttpResponseMessage, and its deserialized content

member.name: M:RestEase.Implementation.Requester.RequestRawAsync(RestEase.Implementation.IRequestInfo)
member.summary: Called from interface methods which return a Task{string}
member.param: IRequestInfo to construct the request from
member.returns: Task containing the raw string body of the response

member.name: T:RestEase.Implementation.RequestInfo
member.summary: Class containing information to construct a request from. An instance of this is created per request by the generated interface implementation

member.name: P:RestEase.Implementation.RequestInfo.Method
member.summary: Gets the HttpMethod which should be used to make the request

member.name: P:RestEase.Implementation.RequestInfo.Path
member.summary: Gets the relative path to the resource to request

member.name: P:RestEase.Implementation.RequestInfo.CancellationToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the CancellationToken used to cancel the request

member.name: P:RestEase.Implementation.RequestInfo.AllowAnyStatusCode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to suppress the exception on invalid status codes

member.name: P:RestEase.Implementation.RequestInfo.QueryParams
member.summary: Gets the query parameters to append to the request URI

member.name: P:RestEase.Implementation.RequestInfo.RawQueryParameter
member.summary: Gets the raw query parameter provider

member.name: P:RestEase.Implementation.RequestInfo.PathParams
member.summary: Gets the parameters which should be substituted into placeholders in the Path

member.name: P:RestEase.Implementation.RequestInfo.PathProperties
member.summary: Gets the values from headers which should be substituted into placeholders in the Path

member.name: P:RestEase.Implementation.RequestInfo.ClassHeaders
member.summary: Gets or sets the headers which were applied to the interface

member.name: P:RestEase.Implementation.RequestInfo.PropertyHeaders
member.summary: Gets the headers which were applied using properties

member.name: P:RestEase.Implementation.RequestInfo.MethodHeaders
member.summary: Gets the headers which were applied to the method being called

member.name: P:RestEase.Implementation.RequestInfo.HeaderParams
member.summary: Gets the headers which were passed to the method as parameters

member.name: P:RestEase.Implementation.RequestInfo.BodyParameterInfo
member.summary: Gets information the [Body] method parameter, if it exists

member.summary: Initialises a new instance of the class
member.param: HttpMethod to use when making the request
